main.description: A declaration of an Okazu-Diary.org profile. If the repository has an `app.bsky.actor.profile` record, the application can substitute omitted properties of this record with the counterpart properties from that record, except for the `createdAt` and `labels` properties.

avatar.description: Small image to be displayed on the profile. AKA, 'profile picture'.

labels.description: Self-label values, specific to the Okazu-Diary.org application, on the overall account.
